place.brazil.note: Country in South America, known for its Amazon rainforest.

place.esmeralda.note: A location visited by Humboldt; near the upper Orinoco River.

place.west_indies.note: A region of the North Atlantic Ocean and the Caribbean.

place.suriname.note: Country on the northeastern Atlantic coast of South America.

place.amazon.note: The largest river by discharge volume of water in the world, located in South America.

place.french_guiana.name: French Guiana
place.french_guiana.note: An overseas department of France on the northeast coast of South America.

place.demerary.name: Demerary
place.demerary.note: Alternative spelling for Demerara, historical region in Guyana.

place.kaieteur_falls.note: A high-volume waterfall on the Potaro River in central Guyana.

place.mazaruni.note: A tributary of the Essequibo River in Guyana.
